Paragraph: Given that benzo [1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene ( BDT ) unit has a large planar molecular structure by fusing a benzene with two flanking thiophenyl units and diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) , i.e.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| benzo [1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDT) |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP) |

The other term, "a benzene with two flanking thiophenyl units" is a description of the structure of the benzo [1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDT) material, not a separate material name.
